DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Pilot/Pharmacodynamic/Genomic Study Neoadjuvant Paricalcitol Target Microenvironment Resectable Pancreatic Cancer
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Previously untreated , apparently resectable , adenocarcinoma pancreas registration . Age great equal 18 year ECOG performance status 02 . Standard laboratory criterion hematologic , biochemical , urinary index within range , opinion physician , clinically support enrollment patient trial . Note : subject must : Creatinine < 2xULN , Transaminases < 3xULN , Neutrophils > 1.5x109/L , Platelets > 100,000/mm3 Ability provide write informed consent Exclusion Criteria Patients hypercalcemia ( blood level great 11.5 mg/dL ; patient kidney disease , blood calcium level must 9.5 mg/dL low start paricalcitol ) . Patients currently pregnant , plan become pregnant , breastfeed . Patients , opinion physician , would clinically appropriate receipt therapy regimen associate participation
